article:
There was a lovely vegetable patch  . A large tree _ there. Both the patch _ the tree gave the place a wonderful look, and _ were the pride of the gardener. But _ knows that the vegetables and the _ couldn't stand   each other. The vegetables hated the tree's shadow   ,  _ it left them only just enough light to live. The tree, on the other hand, _ the vegetables because they drank nearly all the _ , leaving him just enough to live.
The situation became _ serious that the vegetables decided to use up all the water in the ground so that the tree would die. The tree answered back by not protecting the vegetables _  the hot sun, so they began to dry up. Soon the vegetables were really weak, and the tree was drying up.
The gardener wondered why and stopped watering them. When he did that, both the tree and the vegetables _ that it was better to help each other. They learned how to live in harmony with those around them. So they decided to work together, using both the shade and the water to grow well. After seeing how well they were _ , the gardener gave the  _ care to the vegetable patch, watering and fertilizing   it better than any other patch for miles around.
